body:
I will use alpha-4.1
On Tue, Sep 8, 2015 at 21:39 Jorge Canizales notifications@github.com
wrote:

> Technically unnecessary, but for consistency with the other beta releases.
> 
> This assumes the protobuf release will be tagged "v3.0.0-alpha-4.1", per this
> branch
> https://github.com/google/protobuf/blob/v3.0.0-alpha-4.1/Protobuf.podspec.
> @TeBoring https://github.com/TeBoring, if you plan to use another tag (
> v3.0.0-beta-1?), let me know to change this accordingly.
> 
> CC: @nicolasnoble https://github.com/nicolasnoble for info about the
> 
> ## Protobuf commit to point the submodule to.
> 
> You can view, comment on, or merge this pull request online at:
> 
>   https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/3298
> Commit Summary
> - Bump version of gRPC.podspec to 0.11
> - Restrict deployment targets to the protobuf requirement.
> 
> File Changes
> - _M_ gRPC.podspec
>   https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/3298/files#diff-0 (10)
> 
> Patch Links:
> - https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/3298.patch
> - https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/3298.diff
> 
> —
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/3298.

Have you already tested alpha-4.1 branch?
On Tue, Sep 8, 2015 at 21:43 Paul Yang paulyang1211@gmail.com wrote:

> I will use alpha-4.1
> On Tue, Sep 8, 2015 at 21:39 Jorge Canizales notifications@github.com
> wrote:
> 
> > Technically unnecessary, but for consistency with the other beta releases.
> > 
> > This assumes the protobuf release will be tagged "v3.0.0-alpha-4.1", per this
> > branch
> > https://github.com/google/protobuf/blob/v3.0.0-alpha-4.1/Protobuf.podspec.
> > @TeBoring https://github.com/TeBoring, if you plan to use another tag (
> > v3.0.0-beta-1?), let me know to change this accordingly.
> > 
> > CC: @nicolasnoble https://github.com/nicolasnoble for info about the
> > 
> > ## Protobuf commit to point the submodule to.
> > 
> > You can view, comment on, or merge this pull request online at:
> > 
> >   https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/3298
> > Commit Summary
> > - Bump version of gRPC.podspec to 0.11
> > - Restrict deployment targets to the protobuf requirement.
> > 
> > File Changes
> > - _M_ gRPC.podspec
> >   https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/3298/files#diff-0 (10)
> > 
> > Patch Links:
> > - https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/3298.patch
> > - https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/3298.diff
> > 
> > —
> > Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> > https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/3298.
Nico is going to point gRPC's protobuf submodule to it for testing.
